phrases: Keep up the good work this month too.

8,000 a month at home even though

staff of the low-class hot spring inn.

the radical change I am presenting to you today

we are going to choose a new design for the waitresses' uniforms!

chosen something a little more risque...

Do you really think that will work?

If you do not need my consultations,
then there is no need for me to be here.

Should we say something to him?
W-We will be getting to work immediately!

and even went to graduate school?
Apparently, the young master met her in college.
I do understand why he is panicking though.
Our inn is not doing well at all.
We have not been getting many customers for quite some time now.
so that is why we need to try new things.

I would rather not wear stuff like that though.

did not like the uniforms either...
I understand that I am being a tad unreasonable,
but everything I do is for the sake of this inn.
it is better than not trying at all!
I am sure things will work out in the end!
that is how she used to cheer me up.

That is awful, is not it?
that even I can do for Kissuiso.

if she realizes this, why does not she do something

this too the very first time

it is better for Kissuiso to change or not,
